subject: Baseball
Drugs (Pharmaceuticals)
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Football
lead_paragraph: Two lawyers representing George J. Mitchell, who is leading Major League Baseball’s investigation of performance-enhancing drug use, met with officials from the district attorney’s office in Albany.
snippet: Two lawyers representing George J. Mitchell, who is leading Major League Baseball’s investigation of performance-enhancing drug use, met with officials from the district attorney’s office in Albany.
